modal.bet.title: Adjust Bet Amount
modal.sound.title: Sound Settings
modal.info.title: Game Information
modal.info.rulesBody: Jungle Relics is a cascading slot game where winning symbols disappear and new symbols fall into place for multiple wins per spin.
modal.info.howToPlayList: Set your bet amount using the bet adjustment button
Click SPIN to start the game
Match 3 or more symbols horizontally to win
Winning symbols cascade and new symbols fall into place
Free spins can be triggered by scatter symbols or purchased
modal.info.paytableBody: Symbol values are calculated based on your bet amount. Higher value symbols pay more when matched. Scatter triggers free spins; wild substitutes for other symbols.
